column4: ok, i have a serious problem here please ;  i would have lots to paste but i'm in the middle of a breezy update, and cannot open firefox  ; basically, theres a small bug at the end of my install that just...stopped it
no one can possibly help you without seeing the error
where you upgrading hoary or actually installing breezy?
xmms doesn't know or care if you have "mp3 support installed"
did you yrll it to use esound for sound output?
, i think you will have to be more explicit /tell me what to look for...
go to preferences. select output. pick esound.
ok, have selected esound closed and restart, still doesnt work
doesnt work is not a useful description of the problem
well, it shows the same things than before : wich is, 3 choice why it could possibly not work
pkill esd, tell xmms to use oss again
